titleStmt.title: A prophecy of the white king, and dreadfull dead-man explaned to which is added the prophecie of Sibylla Tibvrtina and prediction of Iohn Kepler, all of especiall concernment for these times / by William Lilly ...
titleStmt.author: Lilly, William, 1602-1681.
Kepler, Johannes, 1571-1630.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. M. and are to be sold by John Sherley and Thomas Vnderhill ...,
